title: _D3DHAL_DP2DRAWINDEXEDPRIMITIVE2 (d3dhal.h)
description: The D3DHAL_DP2DRAWINDEXEDPRIMITIVE2 structure is used by the D3dDrawPrimitives2 callback function to render a primitive using vertex indices.
